name: Speedy (LaPeSi)
description:
Speedy is a car dodging game where you are getting a higher score for living longer. The top 5 highscores are shown on an online leaderboard.

It's a very simple, but addictive game to have fun and get better.

100% free to play, but some donations would be cool. The donations are used to make more games, pay the servers and purchase  licenses to upload games at the Play Store / Steam.

Discord: https://discord.gg/SbJs8PF
